dmca.title: Froogle DMCA complaint - Net Enforcer63 - Universal Remote
dmca.body:
Mon, 28 Aug 2006 13:29:22 -0400

Attn: Legal, DMCA complaints
 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named [ Universal Remote ] ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed below are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or items claimed to be infringing.
 

Identity of advertisement(s) at issue/Images owned by [ Universal Remote ] / :
Target
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://images.amazon.com/images/P/B00067R5Y6.16._MZZZZZZZ_.jpg&size=2&dhm=ac8825d2&hl=en
Brand Electronics
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.brand-electronics.com/img/products/icon/28977.jpg&size=2&dhm=89713ca5&hl=en
U Got A Deal
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.ugotadeal.com/images/UNIVERSAL/URC200.jpg&size=2&dhm=511dfa4a&hl=en
Audio Direct
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://www.audio-direct.com/images/products/UNIVERSAL%2520REMOTE%2520CONTROL/ad2-MX-800RFS.jpg&size=2&dhm=b26fdbdf&hl=en
BrandNamez
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://brandnamez.com/prodimg/URC-MX700.jpg&size=2&dhm=d3b034d2&hl=en
ePay Right
http://froogle.google.com/froogle_image?q=http://zalmar.com/images/MX-600.jpg&size=2&dhm=378dc340&hl=en
 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
 

Printed Name: [ Jonquil Bellamy ]
Title & Company: [Enforcement Team, Net Enforcers, Inc.]
Street Address: [P.O. Box 9006]
City and State: [Coral Springs, FL]
Zip: [33075 ]
Email [google@netenforcers.com]
Fax: [954.827.2381]
Date: [ 8/28/06]
 

Truthfully,
/S/:  Jonquil Bellamy
